title: Rose Glow
description: Gentle pinks and rosy highlights softened with cream tones for a dreamy, romantic feel.
usageTips: Use the lightest shade as the background and keep vivid pinks for buttons or highlights.

title: Magenta Muse
description: Vibrant magenta pairs with deep navy for a striking, sophisticated look.
usageTips: Apply magenta sparingly for accents against the darker shades.

title: Coral Charm
description: Warm coral pinks blend with golden hues for a sunny, inviting vibe.
usageTips: Use coral as the primary color with gold for metallic accents.

title: Blush Breeze
description: Soft blush pinks and crisp whites create a clean, airy aesthetic.
usageTips: Use blush as a subtle background with white for sharp contrasts.

title: Fuchsia Fusion
description: Electric fuchsia pops against cool grays for a modern, energetic feel.
usageTips: Highlight interactive elements with fuchsia on a gray base.

title: Peach Petal
description: Peachy pinks and soft beiges evoke a calm, summery mood.
usageTips: Use peach as the dominant shade with beige for grounding.

title: Sakura Spark
description: Pale sakura pinks with mint greens for a fresh, harmonious palette.
usageTips: Apply sakura pink to text and mint for soft backgrounds.

title: Bubblegum Bliss
description: Bright bubblegum pink with retro teals for a fun, nostalgic vibe.
usageTips: Use bubblegum pink for bold headers and teal for borders.

title: Cotton Candy
description: Fluffy pinks and soft lavenders create a whimsical, sugary aesthetic.
usageTips: Use the lightest pink as a background with lavender for accents.

title: Flamingo Fiesta
description: Bold flamingo pink with sunny yellows for a lively, celebratory feel.
usageTips: Use flamingo pink for key elements and yellow for highlights.

title: Pink Dusk
description: Deep pinks and purples mimic the hues of a serene sunset.
usageTips: Use deep pink for backgrounds and purples for gradients.

title: Blossom Breeze
description: Soft pinks with sage greens evoke a blooming garden aesthetic.
usageTips: Use sage as the base and pink for delicate accents.

title: Raspberry Rush
description: Rich raspberry pinks with charcoal for a dramatic, modern palette.
usageTips: Use raspberry for standout elements on a charcoal background.

title: Pink Quartz
description: Icy pinks and silvers create a cool, crystalline aesthetic.
usageTips: Use silver as the base with pink for shimmering highlights.

title: Cherry Bloom
description: Bold cherry pinks with creamy whites for a romantic yet striking look.
usageTips: Use cherry pink for bold accents and cream for balance.

title: Pink Velvet
description: Rich pinks with deep burgundy for a luxurious, elegant palette.
usageTips: Use burgundy as the base with pink for refined accents.

title: Strawberry Shine
description: Bright strawberry pinks with lime greens for a fresh, playful vibe.
usageTips: Use strawberry pink for headers and lime for fun details.

title: Pink Sapphire
description: Vivid pinks with sapphire blues for a bold, gem-like palette.
usageTips: Use sapphire as the base and pink for vibrant accents.

title: Blush Sunset
description: Soft blush pinks with warm oranges for a cozy sunset glow.
usageTips: Use blush for backgrounds and orange for glowing accents.

title: Pink Mist
description: Pale pinks with soft blues create a tranquil, misty aesthetic.
usageTips: Use pale pink for backgrounds and blue for soothing details.
